version_description:
1. Add the feature of adding HomeBase by scanning QR code
2. Change the password rules to be consistent with the EufyHome app.
3. Fix some issues.

1. Add the feature of adding HomeBase by scanning QR code
2. Change the password rules to be consistent with the EufyHome app.
3. Fix some issues.

1. Add the feature of sharing device advanced access, which can share sensor and push notifications.
2. Improve the app occasionally cannot receiving push notification issue.
3. Add the reminder when app notification is disabled in phone settings.
4. Update part of languages.
5. Fix some issues.

1. Added RTSP support. The user can save the streaming videos to the compatible NAS, which supports surveillance camera function. 
2. Add microphone on/off function.
3. Added reminder when the environment temperature is lower than -20C, which is the limit of battery operating temperature.
4. Display HomeBase alarm status and allow the user to switch off remotely.
5. Enabled Entry Sensor notification in Home Mode by default.
6. Fixed some language issues.

1. Added the Device Order feature.
2. Improved the Mode UE design.
3. Moved the sensor push info from app internal to system place.
4. Added the reminder when system auto set failed.
5. Added the reminder when the battery cannot be charged under extreme temperature.

1. Added the Device Order feature.
2. Improved the Mode UE design.
3. Moved the sensor push info from app internal to system place.
4. Added the reminder when system auto set failed.
5. Added the reminder when the battery cannot be charged under extreme temperature.

1. Added Admin permission for Family & Guests (Camera Sharing).
2. Extended the Motion Detection sensitivity range. The user can set the sensitivity higher or lower than before. This is to avoid excessive false alarms or short motion- detection range. 
3. Optimized the Mode Schedule. Now the user can set schedule from the evening of the day to the morning of the next day.
4. Added introduction and setup guide for Mode.
5. Added notification on/off in sensor settings.

1. Added support for the Spanish language
2. Added the NAS configuration guidelines process.
3. Fixed some bugs
Fixed some bugs.
Fixed some bugs.
Fixed some bugs.

1. Added the Help shortcut on the app homepage
2. Fixed some bugs

1. Added the Help shortcut on the app homepage
2. Fixed some bugs

1. Update the Security modes UI and added the security modes customization.
2. Added the reminder when camera placed too close to a wall or obstacle in night vision.
3. Updated the Events UI and filter UI.
4. Updated the camera battery icon.

1. Update the Security modes UI and added the security modes customization.
2. Added the reminder when camera placed too close to a wall or obstacle in night vision.
3. Updated the Events UI and filter UI.
4. Updated the camera battery icon.
1.fixed some bugs.
Fixed some bugs.

1. Added video quality settings for Video Doorbell.
2. Added notification type settings for Video Doorbell.
3. Optimized notification latency for Video Doorbell
4. Optimized Motion Detection sensitivity settings for Video Doorbell.
5. Improved system stability and fixed some bugs.

1. Optimized the app homepage UI
2. Extended the eufyCam alarm timer to 30s
3. Added more notifications when the battery is in low battery and fully charged
4. Added the notification when the device is sounding an alarm
5. Optimized the microSD card reminder
6. Added the Arabic language for eufyCam
7. Added the video clips donating for eufyCam
8. Supported deleting personal messages
9. Added rousing feedback when screenshot on the app

1. Added the feature of clicking notification to jump to video clip.
2. Added the snooze feature for doorbell.
3. Supported Alexa notification skill for doorbell.
4. Optimized the motion detection sensitivity to 5 levels for doorbell.
5. Fixed some bugs.
1. Fixed some bugs.

v1.5.2
1. Supported manually enter Wi-Fi, disable Wi-Fi and test camera signal for eufyCam/E.
2. Added the battery percent on the camera settings when charging for eufyCam/E.
3. Moved the motion test mode to sub-menu for eufyCam/E.
4. Supported set up different brightness on manual, motion and schedule for Floodlight Cam.
5. Supported for non-detect zones for video doorbell.
6. Fixed some bugs.

1. Updated the settings menu for eufyCam/E.
2. Supported the Alexa and Google Assistant for Floodlight Cam.
3. Added the Time zone for Video Doorbell.
4. Added the continuous recording feature when ringing for Video Doorbell
5. Changed the app tones time from 9 to 3 when the doorbell ringing.
6. Fixed some bugs.

1. Supported for eufyCam 2C and eufyCam 2 new camera models.
2. Fixed some bugs.

1. Supported Alexa and Google Assistant for Floodlight Cam.
2. Added Australia region setup process for Floodlight Cam.
3. Updated the motion detection solution for eufyCam 2C/2.
4. Supported for the German language for eufyCam 2C/2.
5. Supported the non-detecting facial in non-detect zones for Video Doorbell.
6. Supported the notification tones settings for Video Doorbell.
7. Added the clip donating type selection.
8. Fixed some bugs.

v1.5.6
1. Supported multi-languages for eufyCam 2C, Floodlight Cam and Video doorbell.
2. Supported Sunset to Sunrise feature for Floodlight Cam.
3. Increased the pre-recording time to 5s for Floodlight Cam.
4. Motion for Floodlights can be controlled separately.
5. Added the non-recording switch for Video Doorbell.
6. Optimized the LED status at night for Video Doorbell.
7. Fixed some bugs.

v1.5.7
1. Supported automatically correct the time zone for eufyCams and Floodlight Cam.
2. HB2 supported compatible with 1st generation Cam.
3. eufyCam 2C supported Italian language, Floodlights Cam and Video Doorbell supported Spanish and Italian languages.
4. eufyCam 2C/2 motion sensitivity level changed from 5 to 7.
5. Added the transformer detection in the Video Doorbell setup process.
6. Supported the non-US region setup process for Video Doorbell.
6. Added the Motion Detection advanced settings for Video Doorbell.
7. Fixed some bugs.

1. Supported for Touch ID, Face ID login app.
2. Added motion test mode for eufyCam 2C/2.
3. Supported for sync devices to eufySecurity app when added devices in the Home app.
4. Added the HomeKit menu in the Smart Integrations menu.

1. Supported for battery doorbell
2. Added the max. device sharing members from 3 to 5.
3. Supported Geofencing for eufyCams and Floodlight Cam.
4. Optimized the Pad version UI design.
5. Merged the eufyCam and eufyCam adding entrance.
6. Optimized the eufyCams signal display.
7. Added the filtered events reminder.

1. Added the Paired Devices menu in HomeBase settings.
2. Optimized HomeBase default display position on the app homepage.
3. Added the GIF guide during Floodlight Cam binding process.
4. Optimized FaceID / TouchID login page.
5. Optimized Smart Detection menu UI.
6. Added the streaming step during Doorbell binding process.

1. Optimized the color and font of event time in the event menu.
2. Changed the watermark switch to three options for eufyCam 2C/2.
3. Merged the status LED settings from two to one for eufyCam 2C/2.
4. Optimized some multilingual text.
1、Fixed the issue of  live view and history videos plays faster than it should for Battery Doorbell.

1. Added the "Explore" tab in the app.
2. Added the "Referral" to the app side menu.
1. Added the HKSV support condition in the HomeKit In Field activation process.

1. Supported Indoor Cam, Smart Lock Touch, and 1080P Wired Doorbell.
2. Added the OFF mode for Keypad(Available on HomeBase v2.0.8.7h+)
3. Supported Cloud Storage for Floodlight Cam.
4. Added the new display types for the message.
5. Added notification switch for HomeBase switch modes.
6. Fixed some bugs.

1. Support cloud storage and trial for IndoorCam.
2. Add Person, Pet, Crying filter in Event Tab for Indoor Cam.
3. Automation supports multiple Triggers corresponding to an Action.(Requires latest firmware.)
4. Add notification tone settings for the Battery doorbell.
5. Unify Snooze interaction of eufyCam, Floodlight and Sensors.
6. Update Working Mode of eufyCam and Battery Doorbell to Power Manager.
7. Add the Community in the side menu.

1. Increase the max. number of main devices added by the app to 20.
2. Battery Doorbell supports 433Mhz Chime.
3. eufy Cam 2C/2 supports the option of no stream and record locally when HKSV is enabled.(Requires latest firmware.)
4. Alarm System supports Arabic, German, Italian.

1. Support German language for Battery Doorbell.
2. Fix some bugs.

1. Support German language for Battery Doorbell.
2. Fix some bugs.

1. Support for eufyCam 2C Pro and 2 Pro.
2. Indoor Cam supports German, French, Italian, Spanish, and Dutch.
3. Events support All, Video, and Alerts filter.
4. Enhance the live stream encryption for Doorbell and Indoor Cam.
5. Shared users can also receive the Top Message.

1. Support for iOS Dark Mode.
2. Support two-factor authentication for Germany and Canada regions.
3. Add notification interval time settings for Indoor Cam.
4. Support Arabic and Japanese languages for Indoor Cam.
5. Support for Spanish, French, and Italian language for Battery Doorbell.
6. Enhance the live streaming security mechanism.
7. Receive EDM mail is not selected by default during creating a new account.

1. eufyCam and Floodlight Cam supports customize motion notification tone.
2. eufyCam RTSP supports setup password.
3. Indoor Cam supports high-speed playback for continuous recording 
4. Support the Arabic language for doorbells.
5. Strengthen password demands when registering an account.
6. Add Middle East customer service contact information in Help.
1. Optimize the log in issue in certain scenarios.

1. IndoorCam supports the SD card diagnosis feature.
2. Indoor Cam Pan & Tilt support indicates the slot position automatically.
3. eufyCam and Battery Doorbell series support no audio when recording clips.
4. Floodlight Cam support supports encryption type selection when manually enter Wi-Fi.
5. Fix some text issues.

1. Indoor Cam supports the Korean language.
2. Indoor Cam supports Geofencing.
3. Update the adding entrance.
4. Remove the still keep clips out of the activity zones for 1st gen eufyCam.
5. eufyCam 2C Pro/2 Pro supports Automation
6. HomeBase supports multiple notification switches for security modes.
1. Fix the bug that causes newly registered users failed to add Wired Doorbell and Indoor Camera

1. Indoor Cam FAQ supports Japanese.
2. The eufyCam series supports the setting of pushing screenshots.
3. Support Wired Doorbell 8202.
4. Doorbell T8220/020 supports multiple languages.
5. Entry Sensor supports "Open" status alert and "Daily" status check.
6. Increase the maximum number of connectable devices.
7. FAQ support search.

1. Optimize HomeBase storage space.
2. Optimize the issue that the eufyCam series occasionally has two identical notifications.
3. Optimize the Doorbell binding process interaction.
4. Doorbell T8220 supports Human Only detection at night.
5. Simplify the default display order for homepage devices on mobile phones.
6. Optimize the permission application copywriting.

1. Optimize HomeBase storage space.
2. Optimize the issue that the eufyCam series occasionally has two identical notifications.
3. Optimize the Doorbell binding process interaction.
4. Doorbell T8220 supports Human Only detection at night.
5. Simplify the default display order for homepage devices on mobile phones.
6. Optimize the permission application copywriting.
1. Doorbell supports setting the special ghost voice response for Halloween. (Only available during the Halloween interaction days in the app.)
1. Support Wi-Fi Bridge for Smart Lock T8500.
1.  Solve the issue that failed to add the Wi-Fi Chime of the Doorbell in some scenarios for iOS users.

1. Support for Smart Lock Door T8510.
2. eufyCam series supports for Solar Panel settings.
3. Indoor Cam supports for Vietnamese language.
4. Improve the positioning success rate of Geofencing.
5. Unifies setting menu UI of doorbell series.
6. Wi-Fi doorbell chime supports for ring volume adjustment.
7. Adapte to iOS 14.

1. Support for Smart Lock Touch&Wi-Fi T8520.
2. Clarify the explanation for the doorbell volume settings.
3. Doorbell T8210 / T8220 / T8222 add a new power saving mode.

1. Indoor Cam supports setting RTSP username and password.
2. Add the close button on the Unable to Charge message box for eufyCam series.
3. The user can manually select a country or region when logging in the app for the first time.

1. Added more details for the smart lock events on notifcation and history. 
2. Optimize the color of solar panel icon in the app.
3. Fix some bugs.

1. Update the cloud storage UI
2. Fix some bugs.

1. Support for new Outdoor Cam.
2. Support for Professional Monitoring Service. (Only available in U.S.A)
3. Fix some bugs.
Fix some bugs.

1. Improved the professional monitoring service experience
2. Fixed bugs of Outdoor Camera
3. Added multi-language support for some cloud storage features
4. Optimized Floodlight Camera experience when scanning QR codes
Enhanced network communication security level.

1. Optimize the setting of the HomeBase.
2. Optimize the copy of the battery doorbell.

1. Improved the professional monitoring service experience
2. Fixed some bugs of Outdoor camera
3. Support for new eufyCam Solo/Pro
Fix some bugs.

1. Support New Floodlight Cam 2 Pro(T8423)
2. Support New SoloCam Spotlight(T8122/T8123)
3. SoloCam(T8130) supports external solar panel function
4. Optimized Outdoor Cam's AI marking function

1. Support new product SoloCam S40.
2. Add panoramic function to control pan&tilt on Floodlight Cam 2 Pro .
3. Add product tutorial in the Settings on Floodlight Cam 2 Pro .
4. Support lock/unlock control in the doorbell‘s live view for Smart Lock with remote control.
5. Optimize the PINCODE modification experience on Professional Monitoring Service.
6. Support custom the sound on APP notification if the alarm being triggered on Professional Monitoring Service.
7. Strengthen the security verification mechanism on all functions.
8. Fix other problems to make the App ease of use.
Optimize the experience of adding device on Floodlight Cam Pro and Solocam
Optimize the experience of adding device on Floodlight Cam Pro and Solocam

1. Floodlight Cam 2 Pro supports adding individual activity zones for each preset position.
2. Floodlight Cam 2 Pro supports multiple languages.
3. SoloCam adds product tutorials to the settings page.

1. Support New Smart Lock(T8501).
2. Optimize Sound Detection and Default Angle settings on Indoor Cam(T8414).
3. Add guidance for default view setting on Floodlight Cam 2 Pro.
4. Add new smart light settings on Floodlight Cam.
5. Add Korean Language on SoloCam(T8130/T8131).
6. Support battery percentage trend of the SoloCam Dashboard(T8124).
7. Strengthen data security checks.
Fix some bugs.

2. Optimize the service introduction and purchase process of Protection Plan.
